document_data.name: Ahlarkhem
document_data.mainbody: '''Ahlarkhem''' was a barony of [[Erlkazar]] encompassing the [[High Peaks]] and their evirons.
document_data.Description: Ahlarkhem Barony was the center of trade for the kingdom of Erlkazar. The barony contained nine villages, which thrived on farming, fishing, and mining. The troops here also were responsible for defending the country from the [[goblin]]s of the [[Cloven Mountains]].
document_data.Geography:
Ahlarkhem was the southeastern barony, neighbored by [[Tanistan]] to the west and [[Shalanar]] to the northwest. [[Shalane Lake]] and the [[Deepwash]] formed its northern border, and the High Peaks of the Cloven Mountains took up most of its southern territory.

Flowing through the High Peaks toward the Deepwash, the [[Arglander River]] was located in this region. It only had a single crossing, the [[Shadebridge]] on the road from [[Duhlnarim]] to [[Saarlik]]. The [[Wintercloak River]] also ran through this barony.
document_data.Government: In [[1370 DR]], Lord [[Purdun|Purdun "The Firefist"]] ruled Ahlarkhem. He was married to the [[Korox Morkann|king's]] sister, Princess [[Dijara]].

Notable Locations.[[Dajaan]]: The ruins of a large port city are located on the south side of the Deepwash across from [[Surkh]].
Notable Locations.[[Duhlnarim]]: This major port city on the Deepwash was the oldest city in the barony.
Notable Locations.[[Furrowsrich]]: One of the largest villages in Ahlarkhem, it sat at the crossroads of roads leading to Duhlnarim, [[Llorbauth]], and [[Five Spears Hold]].
Notable Locations.[[Saarlik]]: This was a haunted town on the Arglander River, part of the ruins of [[Tathtar]] and the end of the [[Tethir Road]].
Notable Locations.Tathtar: The ruins of this small country from the time of the [[Shoon Imperium]] were scattered throughout this barony.

document_data.Notable Inhabitants: The [[vampire]]ss [[Shyressa]] of the [[Twisted Rune]] secretly maintained her primary lair deep within the crypts of the ruins of Dajaan.
